name: Pedestal Knob Box
description: The Pedestal Box is a chic accent piece for your home. The piece is bejeweled with a sculptural bronze-patina brass knob. This piece comes in 4 sizes and different finishes: Long Rectangle Box-10 x 20 x 8.5 cm, Round Box Small-10.5 x 8 x 10 cm, Round Box Medium-13 x 9.5 x 13 cm, Oval Canister-13.5 x 8.5 x 14 cm. Handmade in the Philippines using shagreen, shell, and bronze-patina brass.
